count_total.description:
count_total is set to true  to indicate that the result set should include
a count of the total number of items available for pagination in UIs.
count_total is only respected when offset is used. It is ignored when key
is set.

key.description:
key is a value returned in PageResponse.next_key to begin
querying the next page most efficiently. Only one of offset or key
should be set.

limit.description:
limit is the total number of results to be returned in the result page.
If left empty it will default to a value to be set by each app.

offset.description:
offset is a numeric offset that can be used when key is unavailable.
It is less efficient than using key. Only one of offset or key should
be set.

reverse.description: reverse is set to true if results are to be returned in the descending order.

cosmos.base.query.v1beta1.PageRequest.title:
PageRequest is to be embedded in gRPC request messages for efficient
pagination. Ex:

next_key.description:
next_key is the key to be passed to PageRequest.key to
query the next page most efficiently. It will be empty if
there are no more results.

total.title:
total is total number of results available if PageRequest.count_total
was set, its value is undefined otherwise

retrochain.arcade.v1.ArcadeGame.title: ArcadeGame represents a registered arcade game

retrochain.arcade.v1.GameGenre.title: GameGenre represents different arcade game genres

retrochain.arcade.v1.GameSession.title: GameSession represents an active gaming session

retrochain.arcade.v1.HighScore.title: HighScore represents a high score record

retrochain.arcade.v1.LeaderboardEntry.title: LeaderboardEntry represents a global leaderboard entry

retrochain.arcade.v1.MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.

authority.description: authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).

params.description: NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

retrochain.arcade.v1.MsgUpdateParamsResp.description:
MsgUpdateParamsResponse defines the response structure for executing a
MsgUpdateParams message.

retrochain.arcade.v1.Params.description: Params defines the parameters for the module.

base_credits_cost.title: Base credits cost per game (in uretro)

high_score_reward.title: High score reward in arcade tokens

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryGetTournamentR.description: QueryGetTournamentResponse is response type for the Query/GetTournament RPC method.

retrochain.arcade.v1.QueryListAchievemen.description: QueryListAchievementsResponse is response type for the Query/ListAchievements RPC method.

params.description: params holds all the parameters of this module.

retrochain.arcade.v1.SessionStatus.title: SessionStatus represents the current status of a game session

amount.description: amount is the integer uretro amount to fund.
amount is the integer amount (base units) to stake of params.allowed_denom.
amount is the integer amount (base units) to unstake.

authority.description: authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov module account).

params.description: NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

allowed_denom.description: allowed_denom is the IBC denom (e.g. ibc/...) that can be staked.

retrochain.retrochain.v1.MsgUpdateParams.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.

authority.description: authority is the address that controls the module (defaults to x/gov unless overwritten).

params.description:
params defines the module parameters to update.

NOTE: All parameters must be supplied.

parameters.description: MsgActivateCombo defines the MsgActivateCombo message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: ActivateCombo defines the ActivateCombo RPC - trigger combo multiplier

parameters.description: MsgClaimAchievement defines the MsgClaimAchievement message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: ClaimAchievement defines the ClaimAchievement RPC - claim achievement reward

parameters.description: MsgContinueGame defines the MsgContinueGame message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: ContinueGame defines the ContinueGame RPC - continue after game over

parameters.description: MsgCreateTournament defines the MsgCreateTournament message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: CreateTournament defines the CreateTournament RPC - create new tournament

parameters.description: MsgEndSession defines the MsgEndSession message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: EndSession defines the EndSession RPC - end a game session

parameters.description: MsgInsertCoin defines the MsgInsertCoin message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: InsertCoin defines the InsertCoin RPC - buy credits to play

parameters.description: MsgJoinTournament defines the MsgJoinTournament message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: JoinTournament defines the JoinTournament RPC - join a tournament

parameters.description: MsgRegisterGame defines the MsgRegisterGame message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: RegisterGame defines the RegisterGame RPC - add new arcade game

parameters.description: MsgSetHighScoreInitials defines the MsgSetHighScoreInitials message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: SetHighScoreInitials defines the SetHighScoreInitials RPC

parameters.description: MsgStartSession defines the MsgStartSession message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: StartSession defines the StartSession RPC - start a new game

parameters.description: MsgSubmitScore defines the MsgSubmitScore message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: SubmitScore defines the SubmitScore RPC - submit game score

parameters.description: MsgSubmitTournamentScore defines the MsgSubmitTournamentScore message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: SubmitTournamentScore defines the SubmitTournamentScore RPC

parameters.description: MsgUpdateGameScore defines the MsgUpdateGameScore message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: UpdateGameScore defines the UpdateGameScore RPC - update score during play

parameters.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
UpdateParams defines a (governance) operation for updating the module
parameters. The authority defaults to the x/gov module account.

parameters.description: MsgUsePowerUp defines the MsgUsePowerUp message.
parameters.name: body

post.summary: UsePowerUp defines the UsePowerUp RPC - use a power-up during game
ClaimRewards sends accrued uretro rewards to the user.
FundRewards moves uretro from funder to the module reward pool.
Stake locks allowed_denom in the module account.
Unstake unlocks allowed_denom back to the user (instant).
UpdateParams updates module parameters (authority gated).

parameters.description: MsgUpdateParams is the Msg/UpdateParams request type.
parameters.name: body

post.summary:
UpdateParams defines a (governance) operation for updating the module
parameters. The authority defaults to the x/gov module account.
